category: news
title: "Humana also using AI tool with 90% error rate to deny care, lawsuit claims"
excerpt: "The lawsuit against Humana alleges breach of contract, unfair dealing, unjust enrichment, and bad faith insurance violations in many states. It seeks damages for financial losses and emotional distress, disgorgement and/or restitution, and to have Humana barred from using the AI-based model to deny claims."
